warscrolls.name: Beasts of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Attention Seekers
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick the closest enemy unit to it to be the target. If 2 or more enemy units are tied to be the closest, you can pick which is the target. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. During that move, this unit can move into combat and can pass through models in the target unit, but it must end that move within 1" of the target. If it does so, this unit has charged. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Bloab Rotspawned
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Bilespurter’s Claws and Maw** is 3.

abilities.name: Miasma of Pestilence
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a friendly ability is used that resulted in any damage points being allocated to the target, roll a dice. On a 4+, allocate 1 additional damage point to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for that damage point).

abilities.name: Daemon Flies
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within 7" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+:

• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Epidemius, Tallyman of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Tallyman of Nurgle
abilities.effect:
You gain a number of **tally points** equal to the current battle round number.

During the battle round, you can spend your **tally points**. For each **tally point** you spend, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, 1 wound roll, 1 save roll or 1 ward roll for a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

At the end of the battle round, any unspent **tally points** are lost.

warscrolls.name: Feculent Gnarlmaw
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle

abilities.name: Riddled With Disease
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

warscrolls.name: Festus the Leechlord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Scumboil Pox
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **WIZARD** or **PRIEST** within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the target’s power level, to a minimum of 0, until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Delightful Brews, Splendid Restoratives
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit, **Heal (D3)** the target. If the target is an enemy unit, roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Grandfather's Gardeners
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Blooming Plague
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is **seeded with rot** for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Seeds of Rot
abilities.effect: When using the ‘Blessed by the Plaguefather’ ability, if you choose to infect an enemy unit, you can pick an enemy unit that is contesting an objective that is **seeded with rot**.

warscrolls.name: Great Unclean One
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Colossal Blight Weapons** is 3.

abilities.name: Bloated with Corruption
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit is damaged, pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Locus of Nurgle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Plague Wind
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

warscrolls.name: Gutrot Spume
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Flailing Tentacles
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Pestilential Beachhead
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **aboard the Slime Fleet**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield, wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. Then set up every other friendly unit that is **aboard the Slime Fleet** on the battlefield wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge, wholly within 7" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Master of the Slime Fleet
abilities.declare: Pick a regiment led by this unit to be the target if no units from that regiment have been deployed.
abilities.effect: Each unit in the target regiment is set up in reserve **aboard the Slime Fleet**. Those units have now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Harbinger of Decay
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Cavalry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Omens of Decay
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract twice the current battle round number from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, this ability affects all enemy units within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Knell of Doom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 24" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1" from the Move characteristic of each target and subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for each target.

warscrolls.name: Horticulous Slimux
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast Handler
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Beasts of Nurgle** unit that has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Cultivating the Garden of Nurgle
abilities.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly **Feculent Gnarlmaws** on the battlefield, you can set up a **Feculent Gnarlmaw** wholly within 12" of this unit, more than 3" from all enemy units, objectives and other terrain features.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Afflictions
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Master of Rot Flies
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **Pusgoyle Blightlords** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets’ **Companion** melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Vectors of Foulest Contagion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Blights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Thrice-ripened Death's Heads
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll D3. On 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Festering Bulwark
abilities.effect: The **Blighted Weapons** used by friendly **Putrid Blightkings** units have **Anti‑CHARGE (+1 Rend)** while those units are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Plagues
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Lord of the Blightkings
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **Putrid Blightkings** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Sevenfold Slaughter
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Putrid Blightkings** unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Blighted Weapons** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Morbidex Twiceborn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Tripletongue’s Claws and Maw** is 3.

abilities.name: Gigantic Nurgling-kin
abilities.effect: **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is half the number of damage points this unit has (rounding up).

abilities.name: Tide of Nurglings
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Nurglings** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lord of Nurglings
abilities.effect:
While any friendly **Nurglings** units are wholly within 12" of this unit:

• Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to each of those units each phase.
• Add 3 to those units’ control scores.

warscrolls.name: Nurglings
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Endless Swarm
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Orghotts Daemonspew
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Whippermaw’s Claws and Maws** is 3.

abilities.name: Grasping Tongue
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Acid Ichor
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Plague Drones
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Ripe Pastures
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Plaguebearers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Cloud of Flies
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.name: Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Captain of the Plague Legions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Plaguebearers** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Pusgoyle Blightlords
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Relentless Attackers
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Flyrider’s Arsenal** for attacks that target units contesting an objective you do not control.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Pusgoyle Blightlords (1 model)
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Relentless Attackers
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Flyrider’s Arsenal** for attacks that target units contesting an objective you do not control.

warscrolls.name: Putrid Blightkings
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Bloated Bulk
abilities.effect: Add 3 to this unit’s control score while each model in this unit is contesting an objective you control.

warscrolls.name: Rotbringer Sorcerer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Tainted Sorceries
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was picked to be the target of a spell that was successfully cast by this unit this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from ward rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Rotigus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Gnarlrod** is 3.

abilities.name: Mountain of Loathsome Flesh
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Deluge of Nurgle
abilities.declare: Pick each **DISEASED** enemy unit on the battlefield and each friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit in combat with any **DISEASED** enemy units to be the targets. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:

• If the target is an enemy unit, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• If the target is a friendly unit, **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Bringer of Plenty
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Rotmire Creed
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Virulent Concoctions
abilities.effect: When using the ‘Blessed by the Plaguefather’ ability, if you choose to infect an enemy unit, you can pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it by this unit’s shooting attacks this turn to be the target even if that unit is not in combat with a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Rotigus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Gnarlrod** is 3.

abilities.name: Tentacular Grip
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Befouled Rainfall
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for enemy units while they are within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: Virulent Downpour
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Add 3" to the range of this unit’s ‘Befouled Rainfall’ ability for the rest of the battle. This unit can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

Then, inflict 1 mortal damage on each enemy unit within range of that ability.

abilities.name: Bringer of Plenty
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Jolly Gutpipes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE DAEMON** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

***A-Stabbing We Will Go!:***
Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks.

***Early One Evening My Pustule Was Seeping:***
Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by the target’s combat attacks.

***My Love Is Like a Ripe, Ripe Fart:***
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units that target the target unit.

warscrolls.name: Spoilpox Scrivener, Herald of Nurgle
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Daemon

abilities.name: Keep Counting, I'm Watching You
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Plaguebearers** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D6. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

***Tally of Blows:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

***Recorded Stamina:*** Add 1 to save rolls for the target.

warscrolls.name: The Glottkin
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points,the Attacks characteristic of **Ghurk’s Tentacle** is 2.

abilities.name: Horrific Opponent
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Blighted Stampede
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared the ‘Counter-charge’ command for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick up to 2 friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets. After the ‘Counter-charge’ command for this unit has been resolved, if this unit charged, each of the targets can immediately use the ‘Counter‑charge’ command in an order of your choosing without any command points being spent.

abilities.name: Overgrowth of Flesh
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target, to a maximum of 7 mortal damage.

warscrolls.name: The Wurmspat
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (5+), Chaos, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Rotbringers

abilities.name: Retchling
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **Fecula Flyblown** is on the battlefield, add 1 to its power level for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fecula Flyblown
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Fecula Flyblown** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Disease and Pestilence Personified
rules.effect: From the second battle round onwards, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, by the ‘Wracked with Disease’ ability.

rules.name: From Noxious Skies
rules.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that have **FLY**.
rules.effect: Remove the targets from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Vectors of Contagion
rules.effect: Each time a model in a friendly **ROTBRINGERS** unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a number of dice equal to the slain model’s Health characteristic, to a maximum of 4. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

rules.name: Tenders of the Garden Grotesque
rules.effect: During army composition, you can include 2 **Feculent** **Gnarlmaws** in your army instead of 1.

spells.name: Frothing Mucus
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the **Charge (+1 Damage)** weapon ability has no effect on combat attacks that target the target. If the chanting roll was 6+, weapon abilities other than the **Companion** weapon ability have no effect instead.

spells.name: Infectious Surge
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 6+, for the rest of the turn, the target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

spells.name: Agonising Vomiting
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll 7 dice. If the chanting roll was 6+, add 2 to each roll. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Fleshy Abundance
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:
• Heal (D3) the target.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Magnificent Buboes
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy **Hero** within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks and subtract 1 from casting rolls, chanting rolls, banishment rolls and unbinding rolls for the target.

spells.name: Cloying Quagmire
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn. If the target’s Save characteristic is 3+ or better, subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

artefacts.name: The Carrion Dirge
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 3 from each target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: The Witherstave
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: Rustfang
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the battle.

heroicTraits.name: Corpulent Avalanche
heroicTraits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
Roll a number of dice equal to this unit’s Move characteristic. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

If any damage points were allocated to the target by this ability, this unit can move 2D3". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat with the units it was already in combat with at the start of the move.

heroicTraits.name: Living Plague
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.

heroicTraits.name: Unctuous Preacher
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a **PRIEST**, it has **PRIEST (1)**. If this unit is already a **PRIEST**, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Grandfather's Blessing
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat with a **DISEASED** enemy unit, **Heal** (**D6)** this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Gift of Febrile Frenzy
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1" to the Move characteristic of friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that do not have **FLY** if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the move.

heroicTraits.name: Overpowering Stench
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit in combat with this unit
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

other.name: Incubation Period
other.declare: This ability must be used to deploy this Regiment of Renown.
other.effect: Set up the units in this Regiment of Renown in reserve **festering within**. They have now been deployed.

other.name: Bursting With Life
other.effect: If a friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit would be destroyed, before the last model is removed from play, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each other friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit that has been destroyed this battle. On a 5+, pick a friendly unit that is **festering within** and set it up wholly within 6" of that model. It can be set up in combat.

other.name: Nauseating Convalescence
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
other.effect: **Heal (1)** each unit in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Fog of Despair
other.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target units in this Regiment of Renown while they are wholly within 9" of the **Harbinger of Decay** in this Regiment of Renown.

battleTraits.name: Wracked with Disease
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each **DISEASED** enemy unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Burst Pustules
battleTraits.effect: Each time a **DISEASED** enemy unit would be destroyed, before the last model in the unit is removed from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick another enemy unit within 9" of that model to be **DISEASED**.

battleTraits.name: Desperate Remedies
battleTraits.effect:
If an ability would heal or return slain models to a **DISEASED** enemy unit, that ability does not heal any damage points or return any slain models to it. Instead, it no longer has the **DISEASED** keyword.

**MANIFESTATIONS** and faction terrain features cannot be given the **DISEASED** keyword by any friendly abilities.

battleTraits.name: Blessed by the Plaguefather
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.effect:
You cannot pick **MANIFESTATIONS** or terrain features to be the targets of this ability. Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Infect:*** Pick an enemy unit that is in combat with a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit to be the target. The target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Spread:*** Pick a **DISEASED** enemy unit to be the target. Each other enemy unit within the target’s combat range has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Mutate:*** If all enemy units on the battlefield have the **DISEASED** keyword, inflict 1 mortal damage on each of them.
